# value

**Instance Property**

An unsigned 64-bit integer that represents the contents of an I/O notifier message.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: UInt64
```

## Instance properties

- **addr**: The address of the I/O write.
- **header**: The Mach message header.
- **size**: The size of the value written by the notifier.
- **trailer**: The Mach message trailer.
